profile_data.summary:
I'm a Data Scientist/ Data Analyst with a passion for building scalable applications and data-driven solutions. With experience at American Express, ASU, and Accenture, I’ve developed full-stack applications, built ML pipelines (spaCy, XGBoost), and optimized Salesforce integrations. At American Express, I created an entitlement management system that cut latency by 25% and built an ML model with 92% accuracy.

Proficient in Python, SQL, React, Tableau, and TensorFlow, I’m passionate about leveraging technology to drive impact. I’m currently exploring opportunities as an SDE, Data Scientist, or Data Analyst where I can apply my technical skills and collaborative mindset to solve meaningful problems.
profile_data.headline: Data Scientist | Actively Seeking Fulltime DA, DS, SDE roles | Data Science, Computer Engineer | Accenture, ASU |

experience.description:
-Python, NLP, GLMs, GBMs, SQL, Excel

● Built an end-to-end ML pipeline integrating TF-IDF, SpaCy embeddings, XGBoost, and ensemble models to classify application entitlements with 92% accuracy, leveraging hyperparameter tuning to optimize performance.
● Developed a semi-supervised learning framework using XGBoost, PyTorch, NumPy, and Pandas, employing pseudo-labeling, sample weighting, and confidence-based classification, resulting in a 55% improvement in accuracy, F1 score.
● Designed a hybrid clustering-classification approach using K-Means, DBSCAN, and XGBoost, training cluster-specific models to enhance generalization and reduce misclassification, as validated by a confusion matrix analysis.
● Enhanced NLP pipelines for feature extraction using lemmatization, TF-IDF, tokenization, and document embeddings via SpaCy, NLTK, and Scikit-learn, enabling downstream clustering and classification while improving data efficiency for large datasets (300k+ entitlements).
● Streamlined model performance evaluation using accuracy, F1 score, precision, recall, confusion matrix, and ROC-AUC, employing Stratified K-Fold cross-validation and confidence-based filtering to ensure robustness and reduce noise.
experience.title: Data Scientist

experience.description:
• Data Analysis • SQL • Excel • Machine Learning • Redshift, MySQL • Tableau
• Performed ad-hoc data analysis using Excel (formulas, pivot tables, macros) and implemented SQL queries embedded within stored procedures to prevent duplicate data entries, enhancing data accuracy and integrity. Created data reports and dashboards on Tableau to communicate the results to the stakeholders.
• Achieved a 40% reduction in duplicate contact & lead entries, optimizing operational efficiency across departments.
• Utilized A/B testing methodology with three variants of RFI forms on ASU website to validate hypotheses and improve form completion rates by 20.
• Led the root-cause analysis to identify data sources and impact of field reductions on form completion rates, achieving a 20% increase in form submissions.
• Gathered detailed requirements for implementation of a major feature on ASU website, creating process flow diagrams with Draw.io and leading a successful deployment that enhanced operational efficiency and user experience.
experience.title: Business Data Analyst
